content.rendered:
Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA changes the companys name to Aqualis ASA. See announcement from the company today 20 August 2014.

The company will as from 21 August 2014 be quoted on Oslo Børs with new name Aqualis ASA.

Ticker, ISIN and Instrument ID remains unchanged.
